revision.text:
{{codepointer|Status change|r=Hexen}}'''A_SerpentUnHide'''
(no parameters) Makes the calling actor visible and sets the actor's [[Floorclip|floorclip]] property to 24. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Serpent}} and derived classes. == See also == *[[A_SerpentHide]] *[[A_HideThing]] *[[A_UnHideThing]]
